import React, { useState } from 'react' import './LoginSignup.css' import user_icon from '../Assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../Assets/email.png' import password_icon from '../Assets/password.png' const LoginSignup = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Login Data:', formData) // Here you can add your login logic } return (
Login
Lost password? Click Here!
) } export default LoginSingup
